about_the_game:
The Official Game Soundtrack of Gorky 17 aka Odium. Enjoy Gorky's dark world apart from visuals! An acoustic experience of the action-packed adventure, with a total playing time of over 66 minutes.

Soundtrack composed and performed by Adam Skorupa. Published by TopWare Interactive.
